level.heading: INFORMATION TO BE FILED WITH THE COMMISSION (ยง 15-4302)

level.text: On or before May 1 of each year, the electric utility shall file a report entitled “Distribution Transformer Report” which demonstrates whether the utility complied with the Energy Standards Act of 2007. The report shall include:
The number of models of transformers in each capacity class or type that were evaluated during the reporting period;
The avoided cost of generation and transmission energy and capacity used in the life-cycle cost analysis; and
The estimated savings in energy and capacity resulting from the purchase of transformers in the year, compared with minimally efficient distribution transformers of the same capacity, class or type.
